title: How to write a letter to the HOD of my college for an absence in class because of going to vacation - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi Chakri Do u mean as a faculty or a student? For whatever reasons u r absent as a student u have to put in a medical certificate as that's the only official reason acceptable From address To address The Principal, Abc college, Place Subject : Request to grant medical leave Resp Madam/Sir Your details(Name, class, division) Reason for absence … thanks Name Signature Enclosure- medical certificate From address To The Principal, ……school, …… Subject : Request to grant medical leave Resp Madam/Sir, I, …name class division roll no…, a regular student of your esteemed institution was absent for 3 days. I am a regular student and have a good attendance and academic record. Unfortunately, I suffered an accident and as a result of it, my hand was fractured. This rendered me incapable of attending the school. The doctor has advised me bed rest and complete care so that I heal fast and don't risk any injury. I regret any inconvenience caused. Kindly permit to to submit any assignment or any other work given after I join. I have enclosed a medical certificate and will submit a fitness certificate after my doctor permits me to join. Kindly grant me the leave. Thanking you, Yours sincerely, Name Signature Enclosure- medical certificate
